titles.title: Some Hydrozoans (Cnidaria) From Central Chile And The Strait Of Magellan

descriptions.description: Galea, Horia R., Schories, Dirk (2012): Some hydrozoans (Cnidaria) from Central Chile and the Strait of Magellan. Zootaxa 3296: 19-67, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.280882
